contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for any questions, support, or partnership opportunities
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. We're here to help with all your agricultural needs.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.tellUsMore: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.officeSubtitle: We have offices across Maharashtra to serve you better. Find the location nearest to you.
contact.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products and services
contact.howToOrder: How can I place an order?
contact.orderAnswer: You can place an order by calling our sales team, visiting our office, or through our authorized dealers.
contact.supportAnswer: Yes, we provide comprehensive technical support and guidance for all our products.
contact.deliveryAnswer: Delivery time varies by location. We typically deliver within 2-5 business days.
contact.organicAnswer: We offer both organic and conventional products. All our organic products are certified.
contact.thankYou: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your message. Please try again.
contact.readyToEnhance: Ready to enhance your agricultural productivity? Contact us today for expert advice and premium agricultural solutions.
contact.joinThousands: Join thousands of satisfied farmers who trust Shreyash Agro Industries for their agricultural needs.

about.title: About Shreyash Agro
about.subtitle: Leading the agricultural revolution with innovative solutions and sustainable practices
about.storyText1: Founded in 2008, Shreyash Agro Industries has been at the forefront of agricultural innovation in India. What started as a small family business has grown into one of the most trusted names in agricultural solutions.
about.storyText2: Our journey began with a simple mission: to help Indian farmers increase their yields while maintaining sustainable farming practices. Today, we serve thousands of farmers across 25+ states with our comprehensive range of fertilizers, pesticides, and growth promoters.
about.storyText3: We believe that the success of our nation lies in the prosperity of our farmers, and we are committed to providing them with the best agricultural solutions backed by science and innovation.
about.missionText: To empower Indian farmers with innovative, sustainable, and effective agricultural solutions that maximize crop yields while preserving the environment for future generations.
about.visionText: To become the most trusted partner for Indian farmers, leading the agricultural revolution through innovation, quality, and sustainable practices.
about.valuesSubtitle: These core values guide everything we do and shape our relationships with farmers, partners, and communities.
about.qualityDescription: We maintain the highest standards of quality in all our products, ensuring they meet international standards and farmer expectations.
about.sustainabilityDescription: Our products are designed to promote sustainable farming practices while protecting the environment for future generations.
about.farmerSuccessDescription: We are committed to the success of farmers, providing them with innovative solutions that maximize their crop yields and profits.
about.innovationDescription: We continuously invest in research and development to bring cutting-edge agricultural solutions to the market.
about.journeySubtitle: A timeline of our growth and achievements over the years
about.companyFoundedDesc: Started with a vision to revolutionize Indian agriculture
about.expansionDesc: Expanded operations to 10 states across India
about.marketLeaderDesc: Became one of the leading agricultural solution providers
about.teamSubtitle: Meet the passionate individuals who drive our mission forward
about.founderDesc: Agricultural expert with 20+ years of experience in the industry.
about.headR&DDesc: Ph.D. in Agricultural Sciences, leading our innovation initiatives.
about.salesDirectorDesc: Expert in farmer relations and market development.
about.qualityManagerDesc: Ensuring all products meet the highest quality standards.
about.joinThousands: Join thousands of successful farmers who trust Shreyash Agro for their agricultural needs
